word: The Lord would have the workers in Washington prepare His way before Him. All their capabilities are to be used in giving this last message of warning to the world. The Lord expects every worker to be a laborer together with Him. Let there be no arbitrary forbiddings placed upon the men chosen to engage in God's service.--Ms. 41, 1909, pp. 1, 2, 3. ("A Message to Responsible Men and Church Members," June 3, 1909.)
